Class User

java.lang.Object
models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a user in the hospital management system. This class serves as the base class for different types of users (e.g., Patient, Doctor, Pharmacist). It includes common user properties such as ID, name, password, role, and personal details.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, String password, String role)
      Constructs a User object with the specified user ID, name, password, and role. The password is hashed and salted for security.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user's ID.
      name - The user's name.
      password - The user's password.
      role - The user's role (e.g., "Patient", "Doctor", etc.).

      public boolean isFirstLogin()
      Checks if the user is logging in for the first time.
      Returns:

    • saveModel

      public void saveModel()
      Saves the user's information into the persistent storage (serialization file). This updates the serialized "users.ser" file with the current user's data.
